General.question: Is this a trading platform?
General.answer: Alpha CPX is not a typical trading platform and there is no manual trading.

General.question: Do I need to open an account with Alpha CPX?
General.answer: No account setup needed. Just connect your wallet, authorize capital, and build your portfolio. Your funds and digital assets stay in your wallet. No deposits, no holds, no hassle.

General.question: Can I start a portfolio with Alpha CPX now?
General.answer: Not Yet. For now, the platform only displays its Network Performance Index, a non-interactive, real-time dashboard showcasing live market activity. Itâ€™s internally funded to complete optimization before its commercial release.

General.question: Where can I buy the token?
General.answer: CPX tokens are currently available for purchase on the CipheX website during our active Public PreSale. Visit https://ciphex.io to participate.

General.question: Can I use my Centralized Exchange Account (like Kraken or Binance) to buy CipheX PreSale tokens?
General.answer: No, do not use a centralized exchange wallet to purchase CipheX PreSale Tokens. You must use a self-custodial wallet that you control, such as MetaMask, Trust Wallet or WalletConnect.

General.question: I bought the token, but I can't see it in my wallet. What should I do?
General.answer: All PreSale CPX tokens are subject to our Lockup and Vesting schedule. Once the Public PreSale is closed, CipheX PreSale buyers will be able to claim their CPX tokens using the same wallet they contributed with. Token claiming will occur through our Community Portal and will be live shortly after the Public PreSale begins.

General.question: What is the token symbol and contract address?
What is the token supply?
General.answer: The maximum supply of CPX Tokens is 1,500,000,000, and it is structured with a deflationary model to gradually reduce the total supply over ten years. The CPX Token supply is fixed and will never increase.

General.question: How do I contact support?
General.answer: You can email us at support@ciphex.io

General.question: Do I need to deposit funds or crypto to start?
General.answer: No deposit to any custodial account needed. Just authorize funds from your wallet for Alpha Centurions to execute your portfolio strategy.

General.question: What are the costs and fees?
General.answer: Automated volume-based market execution fees ranging from 0.25% to 0.03%.

General.question: What is the minimum purchase amount?
General.answer: The minimum purchase during presale is 2,000 CPX tokens. You can contribute using USDT, USDC, or ETH.

General.question: Is the presale active?
General.answer: The presale will run for 180 days, with a final price of $0.26. Contributions will stay open until it's officially closed, or the first version of the Alpha CPX is finished and getting ready for commercial launch.

General.question: What is the total token supply?
General.answer: CipheX has a maximum supply of 1.5 billion CPX Tokens. The supply is structured with a deflationary model designed to reduce the total supply by approximately 95% over the next decade.

General.question: How does the vesting schedule work?
General.answer: After the initial six-month lockup period, CPX Tokens enter a one-year vesting schedule. Starting with 3% of tokens vesting in the first month, the monthly release rate increases until all tokens are fully vested within 12 months. Creator Tokens have different vesting terms.

Lockups & Vesting.question: What is a Lockup?
Lockups & Vesting.answer: A lockup is a period during which a contributor's CPX Tokens are not available for trading. The lockup is a crucial aspect of the CipheX PreSale, as it ensures that the token price remains stable and prevents market manipulation. The lockup period is designed to protect all Contributors interests and maintain the integrity of the tokenomics. All CPX PreSale tokens are subject to the same lockup and vesting schedule, to be fair to all participants.

Lockups & Vesting.question: What is the Lockup Period?
Lockups & Vesting.answer: All CPX Tokens will be subject to a six-month lockup period and a one-year vesting schedule after the six-month lockup is complete. The lockup period starts immediately after your CPX PreSale purchase and is managed by smart contracts. Lockup Earnings: You will earn a fixed rate of return on the value of your locked CPX Tokens. The lockup rate of return is equivalent to the yield rate of the 10-year US Treasury, determined at the start of the PreSale. Interest will be paid in unrestricted CPX Tokens, which are claimable at the end of the lockup period.

Lockups & Vesting.question: What is a Vesting Schedule?
Lockups & Vesting.answer: A vesting schedule outlines the distribution of a contributor's CPX Tokens over a specific period. It ensures a gradual release of tokens to PreSale buyers, preventing a sudden influx that could destabilize the token price. Vesting Highlights: Duration: One-year vesting schedule. Distribution Pattern: First Month: 3% of your tokens will become claimable. Subsequent Months: Vesting rates increase incrementally each month. Completion: All CPX tokens are fully vested within 12-months. Example: If you have 100,000 CPX tokens released from lockup: First Month: 3,000 tokens vest. Following Months: Vesting amounts increase each month until all 100,000 tokens are vested by the end of the one-year period.

Lockups & Vesting.question: Do I earn interest on my locked CPX tokens?
Lockups & Vesting.answer: Yes, you will earn a fixed rate of return on the value of your locked CPX Tokens. The lockup rate of return is equivalent to the yield rate of the 10-year US Treasury, determined on the date CipheX Public PreSale begins.

Lockups & Vesting.question: Do Creator Tokens have a Lockup and Vesting Schedule?
Lockups & Vesting.answer: Eighty percent (80%) of tokens are subject to a two-year lock-up period and will adhere to the same six-month lock-up and one-year vesting schedule applied to all CPX Token holders. This alignment reinforces principles of fairness, transparency, and equitable treatment.

Exchange Listing.question: Will CipheX be listed on Centralized Exchanges?
Exchange Listing.answer: Not immediately. Our focus is on building a robust, decentralized community and ecosystem. We believe that by remaining independent, we can maintain greater control over our tokenomics, operations, and long-term vision.

Exchange Listing.question: Where will CipheX be listed?
Exchange Listing.answer: Following the completion of our active Public PreSale, CipheX CPX Token will launch on Uniswap, our preferred decentralized exchange (DEX) platform. After our initial listing, we will focus on establishing market value and demonstrating the functionality of our Market Centurions. As demand for our tokens increases, we will pursue centralized exchanges (CEX) listings to further enhance accessibility, market value, and liquidity for CipheX's Community Members. Once we have finalized our listing strategy, we will make an announcement on our official channels.

Exchange Listing.question: What is your regulatory compliance strategy?
Exchange Listing.answer: CipheX actively monitors regulatory developments in cryptocurrency and intends to comply with evolving standards. However, cryptocurrency markets exist within a dynamic regulatory landscape, where changes in laws, regulations, or policies across regions could impact market access, trading practices, and the legality of certain crypto assets. Additionally, regulatory crackdowns or bans could pose risks to the value and liquidity of digital assets, potentially affecting investors.
